documentation.text: @dev Interface for the Liquidity to Protocol Credit Delegation Pool
@dev allow an address so that it can borrow from the pool*
@dev Deposits an amount of dai to aave and delegates all its borrowing power to the pool*
@dev Nullifies the pool credit delegation, burns the users adai and returns dai*

@dev Uses the pool credit delegation to borrow dai for a whitelisted borrower
 mints debt tokens for the user
 the token's rate is aave's stable rate + the pools rate (TBD)
 borrower has to be whitelisted*

@dev Borrowers burns a part of their debt by sending a corresponding amount of dai
 borrower has to be whitelisted*
@dev Interface for the Liquidity to Protocol Credit Delegation Pool
@dev allow an address so that it can borrow from the pool*
@dev Deposits an amount of dai to aave and delegates all its borrowing power to the pool*
@dev Nullifies the pool credit delegation, burns the users adai and returns dai*

@dev Uses the pool credit delegation to borrow dai for a whitelisted borrower
 mints debt tokens for the user
 the token's rate is aave's stable rate + the pools rate (TBD)
 borrower has to be whitelisted*

@dev Borrowers burns a part of their debt by sending a corresponding amount of dai
 borrower has to be whitelisted*

devdoc.details: Interface for the Liquidity to Protocol Credit Delegation Pool

allow(address).details: allow an address so that it can borrow from the pool*

borrow(address[],uint256[]).details: Uses the pool credit delegation to borrow dai for a whitelisted borrower mints debt tokens for the user the token's rate is aave's stable rate + the pools rate (TBD) borrower has to be whitelisted*

delegate(uint256).details: Deposits an amount of dai to aave and delegates all its borrowing power to the pool*

getDelegations().details: This function returns the current debt situation of the pool's delegators This data is used to compute the addresses and amounts to use when interacting with the pool TBD: try to optimize array size (find a way to deal with unsized array?) *

repay(address[],uint256[]).details: Borrowers burns a part of their debt by sending a corresponding amount of dai borrower has to be whitelisted*

withdraw(address[],uint16[]).details: Nullifies the pool credit delegation, burns the users adai and returns dai*
